title: Practical Competency Development Course Using AI-Based Multimedia Mathematics Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematical concepts and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing job-applicable mathematical application skills for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Derive pattern recognition and problem-solving strategies for math problems with over 80% accuracy using AI analysis tools
Acquire the ability to explain complex mathematical concepts using multimedia content (animation, simulations)
Maintain 90% weekly learning goal achievement through AI-based formative assessment systems in mobile environments
Reduce errors in math problem-solving processes by 50% through real-time audio/visual feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
